questions.question: What colour chopping board should we use when cutting RAW MEAT?

choices.answer: Brown
Red
Green
Yellow

questions.question: What colour chopping board should we use when cutting BREAD or DAIRY products?

choices.answer: White
Red
Yellow
Green

questions.question: What food products are classified as poultry or domestic fowls?

choices.answer: Lambs, cows and sheep
Fish, chicken and red meat (cows)
Ducks, turkey and chicken
Chicken, cows and lamb

questions.question: What is the name of this utensil and what is it used for?

choices.answer: Colander: to drain or rinse food
Sieve: to drain or rinse food
Colander: to separate and remove clumps from dry ingredients
Sieve: to separate and remove clumps from dry ingredients

questions.question: What is this utensil called and what is its use?

choices.answer: Beater: to beat or stir ingredients
Whisk: to beat, stir, or whip ingredients
Whisk: to beat or stir ingredients
Beater: to beat, stir or whip ingredients

questions.question: What are the 3 basic knives?

choices.answer: Chef's, boning and serrated
Chef's, bread and paring
Chef's, paring and serrated
Chef's, steak and paring

questions.question: A chef's knife is used to:

choices.answer: Slice bread and tomatoes
Chop and dice various foods
Peel and trim fat from meat

questions.question: A serrated knife is used to:

choices.answer: Chop and dice various foods
Peel and trim fat from meat
Slice bread and tomatoes

questions.question: How would you use a knife correctly and safely whilst chopping foods?

choices.answer: Curl your fingers inwards like a claw with your fingertips
Put your index finger along the knife of the blade
Lay your fingers flat on the food whilst cutting
Hold the knife with your fingers in the shape of a fist

questions.question: How would you correctly chop foods?

choices.answer: Rest heel of blade on board and move the tip up and down
Lift the knife off the board and saw down into the food
Rest tip of knife on board and move the heel up and down

questions.question: What answer best describes wet (W) and dry (D) ingredients and the best way to measure them?

choices.answer: W: flour, sugar | D: oil, water
W: oil, water | D: flour, sugar
W: any form of liquid | D: any food that can be levelled
W: liquids that level itself | D: foods that can be levelled

questions.question: How would you correctly measure sugar?

choices.answer: Mix sugar and spoon into measuring cup and level off
Spoon sugar into measuring cup, tap then level off
Mix sugar and scoop with measuring cup and level off
Scoop sugar with measuring cup and level off

questions.question: How would you correctly measure flour?

choices.answer: Mix flour, spoon into measuring cup, tap and level off
Mix flour, scoop using measuring cup, tap and level off
Scoop using measuring cup and level off
Spoon into measuring cup, tap and level off

questions.question: How do you measure a liquid?

choices.answer: Pour into spouted measuring jug, measure at eye level
Spray cup with cooking spray, pour, measure at eye level
Spray with cooking spray, pour, measure looking down to jug
Pour into measuring jug, measure at eye level

questions.question: What characteristics should measuring spoons contain? (tsp=teaspoon, Tbs=tablespoon)

choices.answer: Size of spoon in metric measurements which are in grams
Size of spoon in tsp and Tbs and measurements in grams
Size of spoon in fractions of tsp and Tbs such as '1/2'
Size of spoon in fractions of tsp & Tbs, metric measurements

questions.question: How would you correctly measure dry ingredients?

choices.answer: Scoop the ingredient with the spoon, shake off the excess
Scoop the ingredient with the spoon, level off
Scoop the ingredient with the spoon, tap and level off
Scoop the ingredient with the spoon, shake, level off

questions.question: What is the best way to correctly measure liquid ingredients using a measuring spoon?

choices.answer: Over an empty bowl, pour liquid into spoon until full
Pour liquid into the measuring spoon until completely full
Over a bowl, pour liquid into spoon until completely full
Pour liquid into measuring spoon until it reaches half way

questions.question: What Personal Protective Equipment (PPE) must we wear in the kitchen?

choices.answer: Hair net, leather shoes, apron
Hair net, leather shoes, school blazer
Leather shoes, apron, blazer
Hair net, runners, apron

questions.question: What is the correct order when putting on PPE before we begin cooking?

choices.answer: Wash hands, tie hair back, put on hair net and apron
Put on apron, wash hands, tie hair back, put on hair net
Tie hair back, put on hair net and apron, wash hands

questions.question: What is the correct process of washing dishes?

choices.answer: Fill sink (soap+water), rinse dirty dishes, wash, rinse, dry
Rinse dirty dishes, fill sink (soap+water), wash, rinse, dry
Rinse dirty dishes, wash with soap and water, rinse, dry
Fill sink (soap+water), wash, rinse, dry
